bug.author: JohnSmith2007
bug.description: NameError Traceback (most recent call last) in () ----> 1 Audio(song.mp3) NameError: name 'song' is not defined

comments.comment:
Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/JohnSmith2007>@JohnSmith2007</denchmark-link>
you need to use a valid path to your audio file, using a string, something like Audio('song.mp3')
